lines.text: You know, dead people aren't the ones to be scared of, living people are.
You're my sister. You're supposed to be on my side!
[David is in a hot tub with a radio right next to it.]
[Mikey kicks the radio in the hot tub. David gets electrocuted.]
Hello, are you going to be my new mommy and daddy?
Miss Gilder you're the best teacher I've ever had, but there is one thing you never taught me.
[Shoots her in the head with a ball bearing fired from a slingshot]

[as she attempts to answer the phone call made to distract her while Mikey does his thing]
Is this some kind of joke?
